body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Tyler Hernandez and the customer's name is Carolyn Cook.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Stellar Accounting Firm. My name is Tyler Hernandez. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Tyler, I'm Carolyn Cook. I'm calling regarding some issues I've been having with my billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that with me, Carolyn. I'm here to help. Can you please tell me what specific issues you are encountering?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I noticed an unexpected charge on my last invoice, and I'm quite puzzled about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how concerning unexpected charges can be. To assist you better, could you please provide me with the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carolyn. And could you also provide me with your date of birth, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My date of birth is January fifth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Let me take a look at your account and see what might have caused that charge.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Tyler. I appreciate your help with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Carolyn! I will resolve this issue as quickly as possible. Thank you for your time today, and please feel free to reach out if you have any further questions.
